page.title: 10MR MELLORS OF DEFYNNOG
page.content: I got up at quarter past seven got dressed and made a cup of tea and let Lady (our budgie) out of her cage. Karen, my eldest daughter, came down so I made her a cup of tea. Then at 5 to 8 I made Zoe (my youngest) and my wife a cup of tea. Then I went to work on my motor bike. When I got to Senny bridge camp I Filled in the paper work and had a meeting with my boss. Then I repaired underground cables. Later I came home and changed and went to my mum's. We had dinner and fruit salad for afters. Then I went to a Labour Party meeting to discuss the election (Brecon & Radnor July 4th 1985). Then I picked up the children and we went home. My wife dropped me off at the pub. I had a pint and talked for a bit then I had two more pints and went home and went to bed. (27/6/85 D.A. Mellors. Transcribed by Sarah Mellors)
